vals: Frontend Developer (React): Built a responsive React dashboard with reusable components, improving data visualization and user interaction.
Automation Tester: Automated test cases with Selenium and Cucumber, enhancing test coverage and framework maintainability.

education.items: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology

intro: Expertise in full-stack development, proficient in building responsive front-end applications with React, and scalable backends using Node and Express.
Skilled in test automation with Java, Selenium, and Cucumber using the BDD framework. Experienced in building efficient automated test scripts and frameworks to ensure high-quality software.
about.personal: I‚Äôm passionate about coding and love the thrill of creating something new. I enjoy building applications because I get to see the impact of my work come to life. My 7 months as an Automation Tester gave me valuable insights into building reliable, high-quality software. When I‚Äôm not immersed in tech, you‚Äôll often find me playing cricket or exploring new ways to stay creative and active.

crm.name: CRM Dashboard

work1.name: Weather App
work1.description: A dynamic weather application that displays the weather of different cities. It provides users with real-time weather information, enhancing their ability to plan and adapt to various weather conditions.
